scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend-public && npm run install:frontend-admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend-public" "npm run dev:frontend-admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend-public && npm run build:frontend-admin
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend-public" "npm run start:frontend-admin"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend-public && npm run lint:frontend-admin
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset && npm run seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend-public/node_modules && rm -rf frontend-admin/node_modules
